main event: A witness reported seeing a circular luminous object approximately 25 feet in diameter hovering for 5 minutes before moving off rapidly in Hamilton, New York on 9 May 1954.
interesting points: The object emitted a red glow and was visible for 5-10 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., The witness was a civilian named Robert J. Clavinger., The object displayed an erratic flight pattern and hovered before moving quickly., The weather conditions were clear during the observation., The report was submitted to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
